text: The 2011–12 NHL season was the 95th season of operation (94th season of play) of the National Hockey League (NHL). Thirty teams competed. There were 82 games in the regular season from October 6, 2011 to April 7, 2012. The 2012 Stanley Cup playoffs began on April 11, 2012. The Los Angeles Kings won the Stanley Cup. During the off-season, the Atlanta Thrashers relocated to Winnipeg, Manitoba, to become the Winnipeg Jets. ==Other websites== *NHL.com Category:2011 in ice hockey Category:2012 in ice hockey Category:National Hockey League seasons Category:2011 in North America Category:2012 in North America
title: 2011–12 NHL season
